diff_act: 1.replace the user with a new Computer Opponent

regen.absent_element: replacement of departed user with a new Computer Opponent when they leave early
regen.new_specification: When a user departs early, the system shall replace them with a new Computer Opponent to continue the game.

label: If a user leaves the game prematurely, a new CO is created to fill their place.
absence: creation of a new CO to fill the place of a user leaving the game prematurely
